about_the_game:
The combination of classic gameplay and the wonderful collision with history. A Roguelite game, experience the fun of civilization!
Q~J-civILiZaTiOn-S is a casual game that combines classic casual gameplay with Roguelite elements, by eliminating again and again to collect entries and heroes, in order to gain points in another mode to compete with other civilizations. Experience a strange experience where civilizations compete with each other in the long river of history!

The combination of classic gameplay

Each row that is eliminated represents the passage of a year in human history

the wonderful collision with history

and if the number in that row happens to belong to that year, you will collect a chronology of events for that year. At the same time, there will be other opportunities to collect historical celebrities. to help you win in other game modes

compete with other civilizations in battle mode

Once you've collected enough Hero Cards, you'll be able to compete against other civilizations in this mode, earning points to win in a variety of conditions by playing Hero Cards.
